title: Manner of fixing rain water pipes- Rain water pipes shall be affixed to the outside of the walls of the building or in recesses or chases cut or formed in such walls or in such any other manner as may be approved by the Commissioner
clause_text: Manner of fixing rain water pipes- Rain water pipes shall be affixed to the outside of the walls of the building or in recesses or chases cut or formed in such walls or in such any other manner as may be approved by the Commissioner.
